subtitleNullable: Huge corpus of textual data about LinkedIn posts related to layoffs
descriptionNullable:
This dataset contains around 136k posts scrapped form linkedIn from Dec 2022 to May 2023, specifically about the mass layoffs which have occurred during that time.

The data was scraped on a regular basis through the time period and many of the entries were deduplicated for better usability.
title: LinkedIn Posts about Layoffs (2023)
subtitle: Huge corpus of textual data about LinkedIn posts related to layoffs
description:
This dataset contains around 136k posts scrapped form linkedIn from Dec 2022 to May 2023, specifically about the mass layoffs which have occurred during that time.

The data was scraped on a regular basis through the time period and many of the entries were deduplicated for better usability.
